Reviews.Title: Awesome Cell phone!!!!
Reviews.Author: Fireman26 "FireMan 18"
Reviews.Content: My service is Net10 (Straight Talk) in Northern, Va. Everything works: Data, Text and Picture Text. You would have to go to its website to setup the data service with a new APN.I only have this phone for a day,  got it yesterday (03/18/2014).  I got it one day in advance ( Thank you Amazon for that) and I'd started to play with it right away.**The Best things about this phone (Version D802) is that, it does not come with any pre-loaded and annoying software packages from neither AT&T; nor T-Mobile or any other cell phone company. Thank You God!! So you are not limited by them.  However It does come with some LG applications as expected.You will love that the you can activate the Tethering on this phone since it does not have any limitation from Att or T-Mobile.  I have done it with my Net10 service, but I cannot abuse it otherwise my service will be cancelled by Net10This phone is like a rocket, very fast. Responsiveness is for a person whom want everything for "yesterday" like me. Again this phone is lightning fast!!.  The phone has a gorgeous and perfect HD screen. The colors are bright and the details are amazing (I'm not going to be too technical about this).Playing Videos (Netflix, Hulu Plus, The CW and more) are play without a hiccup, very smooth like a silk. Going through the movies on Nextflix is not frustrating anymore, you will see the icons almost right away. Now  my internet Service is Comcast 50MB Download, this also can play a difference while using applications that connect to the internet. Your responsiveness might be different.Streaming music via Pandora and Spotify is not a problem either.  Both applications work like charm while streaming.Speaker, i think is the weakest point on this phone. It is an average speaker.  I think LG could have done a better job with the speaker considering that this is a high-end cell phone. But not a big deal for me since a use headphones or my Vizio 5.1 speaker system.**Battery Life is amazing if I compare it with my previous LG G Optimus. The LG G2 with mild (phone call, internet use, chat, audio stream, emails) use from 6:00 to 18:30 I still have 76%. My one-month-old LG G from 6:00-16:00 is with 5-10%. I have not have a heavy use yet, but I will let you know how that goes. This phone also come with an international adapter and a head phone.The 2 taps on the screen to " wake up" the phone, I like that. I found out that it is easier that trying to push the power button to "wake up" your phone.I found out that that it is easier for me to use both the volume and the power button on the back of the phone, since my index finger is right on top of the them while I'm talking.  I do not have to guess where the volume is anymore.I haven't taken my first picture  with the 13mb-camera or use skype yet.This phone has a Guest Mode, like the computers do. If somebody wants to use your phone, just switch it to Guest Mode and that person won't be able to screw up your phone, change anything or look at your personal information.  You can also decide what application(s) that person can use while on Guest Mode. Nice!!! Specially if you have children whom like to play with your phone or watch videos.Being an iPhone user (up to iPhone 5), I can tell that this phone is way better, even better that the iPhone 5s.This is everything for now, I will be back to let you know the rest.  I hope this humble review help you to make a more inform decision and remember that you might have a different experience base on your cell phone company and your internet service provider.

Reviews.Title: awsome!!!!
Reviews.Author: Zafir Khan
Reviews.Content: I've been an LG user for some time, great phone, really quick. Still figuring some features. A very Good purchase

Reviews.Title: Best Cellphone I've taken
Reviews.Author: Daniel B.
Reviews.Content: 5 stars.This is a great cellphone, amazing camera and recording video.I have made a very good inversion.This is an excellente cellphone if you're from Venezuela

Reviews.Title: very HAppy
Reviews.Author: Filippo Scagni
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the purchase of this amazing cell phone. The  battery life is incredible . Never runs out. Video and photos are beyond my expectations.The only limitation is that this cell is large to have in handDo not keep looking, this cell will not dissapoint you.

Reviews.Title: LG G2 This phone is a Beast
Reviews.Author: Jerome Sereki
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this Device. I only wish it had exta sdcard. I am looking forward to the release of LG G3 later at the end of this year.

Reviews.Title: iLike, came on time, international version
Reviews.Author: Amira Hegazy
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it yet, I'm travelling abroad soon, but I thought to give a quick review about the packaging & the phone as a hardware. The phone came in the perfectly-shielded shipping box, without a scratch. When I opened the box, I could see that the factory seal of the box is broken, however covered with another circular LG sticker. May be it's something genuine, like the open box merchandise you get from Best Buy & other places. The mobile box contains the phone, headset, USB cable, & the charger unit. All of them are sealed & with new tags/plastic covers on them. The phone is not marked by any provider's logo.I'll update my feedback once I use it abroad. Overall, it's a positive first impression

Reviews.Title: Doesn't last
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: Ive hd my phone for about a month now and it will no longer hold a charge and it takes a full day to even charge the phone.

Reviews.Title: lifestyle cellphone are scammers... do no lift 3g in 1900 band
Reviews.Author: Judit &.
Reviews.Content: ok, let's begin, it is possible that my phone lg g2 sold you do not lift the band 3g 1900?? it is cheating the consumer, the seller is cellphone lifestyle are swindlers, it hurts not in USA because I demand ...

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PHONE
Reviews.Author: Phillip Ray
Reviews.Content: For the price there is no better phone on the market. No doubt. I used to have an iphone and now I understand why android people would get so frustrated when I would say apple is the best. This phone is amazing. The screen, the camera is great, and its super super fast never lags or closes apps. Plus androids ability to customize just blows away IOS. This is an awesome phone, you should buy it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone
Reviews.Author: Francisco Barbato
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. I've just passed my iPhone 5 to my wife, after many years of using Apple smart phones. I am aware that the Samsung market penetration should have a strong reason, and I wanted to experiment a change in my life. But before to make a decision I checked the reviews and discovered that LG has a better ranking than Samsung, and is cheaper, probably because is not "in fashion" as the latter.  I am using the LG G2 since one week, so I am still discovering his features and trying to get used with Android. So far, I am very satisfied with the phone and I think that will fulfill my expectations.

Reviews.Title: the better cell that I have
Reviews.Author: Jurdi
Reviews.Content: In a lot of senses is much better that the Galaxy s4 in hardware and the software is very practice and nice,

Reviews.Title: G2
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I do like LG G2. It is so powerful . It is  much better than Samsung's galaxy series. I am happy to buy g2

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: A great phone.Fast, big and the battery is beyond my expactations.A really good android softwareWith nicr features

Reviews.Title: Better than Samsung
Reviews.Author: KARL PERALTA
Reviews.Content: What can i say i had a Galaxy s4 but the LG G2 blows it out of the water. The G2 is super fast and the screen is gorgeous.compared to the Galaxy S4. I will say i wish i could add a micro sd but its nota deal breaker.

Reviews.Title: does not work for 4G LTE in Venzuela
Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: buy this phone, according to the characteristics supports 4G LTE network not working yet or 4G option shows only 2G and 3G. I live in Venezuela and I have 4G I plan to work on another phone of another brand.I also Lg update of 4.2.2. to 4.4.2 and now I do not recive or sends text messages. if anyone can help me solve these problems I thank

Reviews.Title: I Love it
Reviews.Author: Irxis
Reviews.Content: Excellent smartphone.. The desing is very pretty and easy to use, A pretty fast funcionality, The screen can be scratched very easy, however it is an excellent phone.

Reviews.Title: Expect more from camera
Reviews.Author: Paulo Luzio
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my wife take pictures of our children. With day light the photos are good but could be much better and with low light they are bad.

Reviews.Title: awesome phone
Reviews.Author: babsamin
Reviews.Content: i liked the phone very much. It is big and good enough to handle in a single hand. Smooth transaction with the seller. phone was like the way it was described.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Chanty
Reviews.Content: Very happy and impressed with the g2. Met all my expectations and was sent to me in perfect condition. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone and services
Reviews.Author: chao
Reviews.Content: This is such an amazing phone.  I am still trying it out because I just got it.but it soooo amazing! The seller is such a wonderful person to deal with in terms of customers service. He answered all my questions and on time too. The product was as desctibrd. I would recommend this seller to anyone. I had problems getting the mms to work but I went to my provider and got it fixed. You also have to be careful because its such a responsive phone with little touch. I can say its the new generation phone. Be patient and get use to it. This is my first week. Will keep you informed..

Reviews.Title: Beware! Model # lg-ls980 doesnt allow external memory cards!
Reviews.Author: Ben "Ben"
Reviews.Content: Major deal breaker.  This phone has amazing features and is ready for the future, except for this one unacceptable downgrade

Reviews.Title: Don't Update!
Reviews.Author: Yolanda Manjarrez
Reviews.Content: Great phone. It'ts great until you plug in headphones. It makes a weird hissing sound that can be a deal breaker.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone but LG can improve our experience
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: It's fast, good battery, great screen, good camera, very good IR remote control.We appreciate the fact that the LG G2 has FM Radio but we really miss the ability of the 3rd button of the headset to change stations and turn off the radio. It's not justified the fact to take it out of my pockets every time I want to change stations. Hopefully this will be improved in updates.I really like the three Front Touch Buttons on the screen 5.2 inches. However, this buttons greatly reduce the real screen size to 4.8 inches most of the apps. I suggest a new option to hide/show this buttons in order to maximize the screen usage. Hopefully this will be improved in updates.

Reviews.Title: ¿LG Version??
Reviews.Author: Jose Daniel Mendez Tavarez  WB-1401 "@JDMTZ16"
Reviews.Content: Please, I would like to know if it is  LG PHONE VERSION?? ... or  any other carrier.  Thanks! :)*WHITE - 32GB. / D802

Reviews.Title: broken screen
Reviews.Author: nelson ricardo
Reviews.Content: It broke the screen after falling once. is very fragile. I do not buy more products from LG. My next will be a Iphone.
